```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
spells <- dnd5e::spells %>%
  select(name) %>%
  mutate(link=paste0(name,".html"))

cat(paste0("- [",spells$name,"](",spells$link,")"), 
    sep="\n\n") # need html/markdown line return
```
